ygData.msgSnippet: The wolf got a beed on her location and started running toward it. He just hoped that it was a typical Pred following her. All guns no brains he said to

The wolf got a beed on her location and started running toward it. He 
just hoped that it was a typical Pred following her. "All guns no 
brains" he said to himself. The Pred broadcast information on all 
channels, maybe he didn't know how to tap into direct communication. 
Lunarpine didn't want to underestimate the Pred, it could be a trap.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( Shadow Wing is a Recon Scout.That is her primary function.)
> 
> ::Shadow Wing:
> 
> She heard a voice on her comm link.  It was Lunarpine.  She didn't 
> want to answer it.  She knew he could fight this pred who was after 
> her.  But she wanted to prove that she could make it. She not only 
> wanted to prove it to him, but to herself as well.  She opened her 
> comm link. "I have a Pred on my tail feathers, but I think I lost 
> him." She looked about and still didn't see the Pred. "Yeah, I 
don't 
> see him so I guess I lost him." She sighed. She liked hearing his 
> voice, but she still didn't want to face him.  She knew she would 
> have to, but she wanted to hold off on that as long as possable.
> "I'm fine." She closed her comm link and flew off to the west 
again.  
> she rose into the sky to get a good look around.  She used her 
> telescopic vision and didn't see the Pred.  She flew closer to the 
> ground.  She knew that when she used her comm link, that she could 
be 
> traced.  She had to keep moving.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The wolf opens a direct link to Shadow Wing on his comm "SHADOW 
> WING, 
> > Answer me fraggit,Are you in trouble?" His comm remained silent 
for 
> > the moment, if she'd only open a link he could trace it.(What is 
> > Shadow Wings function, you didn't put it on her character page.)
